pageContext.collection: Returned to the Antiquaries, 3/10/78,Lambor, G. - private,[Clough, R. T. - Private],Apparently returned to Mr. Lambor,Bought from Mr. G. Lambor, a Brighton dealer where it was with a genuine plain lead spearhead,Almost certainly Cast No. 4 stolen from Soc. of Antiquaries
pageContext.toSearch: Little Wenlock, Telford, Telford And Wrekin Tf6, UK
pageContext.remarks: Typed label: accompanying this and companion piece (recent looking): "Found Whitechurch, Salop 1846 or 1856" but certainly a cast of the Willowmoor piece.,V. old label round socket: "A cast from a spear.....on the Wrekin, Tenement, Salop, in 1834.",SN April 78,PI,Info. submitted in 14/4/78 by Miss L.F. Chitty. Object submitted by Mr. Lambor 20/4/78
